May 2023

Welcome to Your Justia Insights Newsletter 

Stay informed with the newsletter designed to bring updates and insights from our team directly to the Justia Connect community.

In this edition of Justia Insights, you can learn about Google Ads for lawyers and register for our upcoming Justia Webinars. Explore the latest news and information in the law and technology industries, including commentary on whether artificial intelligence is coming for lawyers and news about the ABA’s data breach. Plus, check the Justia Ask A Lawyer section to see if you are this month’s Featured Participating Member, catch up with Team Justia as we continue celebrating our company anniversary, and more!

From the Desk of Justia

Want instant updates? Justia Connect members can subscribe now.

Google Ads for Lawyers: A Beginners Guide to PPC Success

Google Ads is the most popular PPC advertising platform in the world. While most legal professionals have an idea of what PPC advertising is, many believe outdated PPC wisdom or are hesitant to give it a try. Check out this post to dispel some common myths and get beginner's PPC tips for your practice.

Effective Digital & Traditional Marketing for Small Law Firms

Lawyers can learn about effective marketing strategies for small law firms with David Alan Wolf, Partner at Wood, Atter & Wolf P.A. in this recent Justia Webinar.

Justia Legal Guides: Car Accidents Center

When a driver takes their eyes off the road for even a few seconds, the consequences can be catastrophic. The Justia Car Accidents Center provides guidance to victims of distracted driving accidents and other crashes.

Justia Legal Guides: Tax Law Center

There’s a reason why an industry has evolved to help people with their taxes. The laws don’t make much sense to the average person. Justia aims to take some of the mystery out of the process with the Justia Tax Law Center.

Featured Webinar

The Ethics of Online Advertising and Marketing

We're back with a CLE to help demystify the ethical implications surrounding digital/online advertising for lawyers and law firms! In this 60-minute presentation, we'll cover various ethical implications of digital legal marketing used to engage current clients and reach new clients.
